column1: #Text=And a lot of people are morons and irresponsible , so —
#Text=DS : But then does n't responsibility come down to defining it for yourself in Satanism ?
#Text=Your statements seem to come down to a baseline level of what is responsibility ?
#Text=Whereas you were saying earlier that a lot of these things are self-referentially defined .
#Text=We allow people to make that definition for themselves , absolutely .
#Text=But for me personally , you try to deal with other people around you so that you do n't make their lives miserable unless there is some real overriding reason that would have to happen .
#Text=DS : Who are you supporting for President ?
#Text=Right now , there is not really one candidate that speaks to me more than others .
#Text=I generally feel that so many candidates are lacking in so many ways , that it really IS the lesser of multiple evils that you are picking .
#Text=I like the old Lovecraftian t-shirt : " Cthulu for President !
